TEXT.TITLE: GEICO CORP <GEC> NAMES NEW BOARD MEMBERS
TEXT.BODY:
Geico Corp said it named two board members, W. Reid Thompson, chairman and the chief executive officer of Potomac Electric Power Company, and Norma Brown, major general US Air Force retired.
Reuter
